mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(a.coding)) FROM t_flawconfirm f,t_eliminate_record r,t_eliminate e,t_task a,t_thread h,t_tower w,t_systemparam s,t_flaw wa WHERE f.id=r.yetid AND r.xtaskid=e.taskId AND r.xtaskid=a.id AND h.id=f.threadId AND wa.id=f.flawId AND f.towerId=w.id AND s.id=f.flawGrade AND a.actualDate is NOT NULL

SELECT distinct a.coding tcoding,a.`name` tename,h.coding ethreadCoding FROM t_flawconfirm f,t_eliminate_record r,t_eliminate e,t_task a,t_thread h,t_tower w,t_systemparam s,t_flaw wa WHERE f.id=r.yetid AND r.xtaskid=e.taskId AND r.xtaskid=a.id AND h.id=f.threadId AND wa.id=f.flawId AND f.towerId=w.id AND s.id=f.flawGrade AND a.actualDate is NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_flawconfirm f,t_eliminate_record r,t_eliminate e,t_task a,t_thread h,t_tower w,t_systemparam s,t_flaw wa WHERE f.id=r.yetid AND r.xtaskid=e.taskId AND r.xtaskid=a.id AND h.id=f.threadId AND wa.id=f.flawId AND f.towerId=w.id AND s.id=f.flawGrade AND a.actualDate is NOT NULL AND a.coding=#{tcoding}
